p:
SARS-CoV entry into cells has been shown to downregulate ACE2 expression
62, 106, 107 . In a mouse model of SARS, ACE2 levels in the heart were significantly reduced after SARS-CoV infection
62 . In addition, a separate study reported that knockout of Ace2 in mice resulted in a significant reduction in cardiac contractility
108 . Furthermore, Ace2
–/–
Apoe
–/– mice had greater atherosclerotic plaque accumulation and upregulated expression of genes encoding adhesion molecules and inflammatory cytokines such as IL-6 and CCL2 compared with Apoe
–/– mice
109 . These results support a cardioprotective role of ACE2 (ref.
61 ).
